source: أسماء الله الحسنى - The 99 Names of Allah

names.meaningAr: ذو الرحمة الواسعة التي وسعت كل شيء
names.meaningEn: The One who has plenty of mercy for the believers and the disbelievers in this world and especially for the believers in the Hereafter
names.benefitAr: من أكثر من ذكره وجد رحمة الله في قلبه
names.benefitEn: Whoever frequently remembers this name will find Allah's mercy in their heart

evidence.textEn: In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful

names.meaningAr: ذو الرحمة الخاصة بالمؤمنين يوم القيامة
names.meaningEn: The One who has plenty of mercy for the believers
names.benefitAr: من ذكره بعد كل صلاة وجد الرحمة والبركة
names.benefitEn: Whoever mentions this name after every prayer will find mercy and blessings

evidence.textEn: And He is ever Merciful to the believers

names.meaningAr: المالك لكل شيء، المتصرف في ملكه كيف يشاء
names.meaningEn: The One who is the King and Owner of everything, who manages all affairs
names.benefitAr: من ذكره عند الفجر أغناه الله عن الخلق
names.benefitEn: Whoever remembers this name at dawn, Allah will enrich them

evidence.textEn: So exalted is Allah, the True King

names.meaningAr: المنزه عن كل نقص وعيب
names.meaningEn: The One who is pure and free from all imperfections
names.benefitAr: من ذكره طهّر الله قلبه من الشرك والنفاق
names.benefitEn: Whoever remembers this name, Allah purifies their heart

evidence.textAr: هُوَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ٱلْمَلِكُ ٱلْقُدُّوسُ
evidence.textEn: He is Allah, other than whom there is no deity, the King, the Holy

names.meaningAr: السالم من كل عيب ونقص، ومنه السلامة
names.meaningEn: The One who is free from every imperfection and the source of peace and safety
names.benefitAr: من ذكره أمّنه الله من كل مكروه
names.benefitEn: Whoever remembers this name, Allah will protect them from all harm

evidence.textEn: The King, the Holy, the Source of Peace

names.meaningAr: الذي يصدق عباده وعده ويؤمنهم من عذابه
names.meaningEn: The One who gives security and faith to His servants
names.benefitAr: من ذكره أمّنه الله من الفزع يوم القيامة
names.benefitEn: Whoever remembers this name, Allah will grant them security on the Day of Judgment

evidence.textEn: The Source of Peace, the Guardian of Faith, the Overseer

names.meaningAr: المسيطر على كل شيء، الرقيب الحافظ لكل شيء
names.meaningEn: The One who watches over and protects all things

evidence.textEn: The Guardian of Faith, the Overseer, the Almighty

names.meaningAr: الغالب الذي لا يُغلب، القوي الذي لا يُرام
names.meaningEn: The One who is mighty and powerful, whom none can overcome
names.benefitAr: من ذكره أعزّه الله ونصره
names.benefitEn: Whoever remembers this name, Allah will honor and support them

evidence.textEn: And He is the Almighty, the Wise

names.meaningAr: الذي يجبر الكسير ويغني الفقير ويصلح الأمور
names.meaningEn: The One who mends the broken and compels all things according to His will

evidence.textEn: The Almighty, the Compeller, the Supreme

names.meaningAr: المتعالي عن صفات الخلق، ذو الكبرياء والعظمة
names.meaningEn: The One who is above all that is attributed to creation, possessing all greatness

evidence.textAr: ٱلْجَبَّارُ ٱلْمُتَكَبِّرُ سُبْحَانَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
evidence.textEn: The Compeller, the Supreme. Exalted is Allah above whatever they associate with Him

names.meaningAr: الذي خلق كل شيء من العدم
names.meaningEn: The One who creates everything from nothing

evidence.textEn: He is Allah, the Creator, the Originator, the Fashioner

names.meaningAr: الذي برأ الخلق وأوجدهم على غير مثال سابق
names.meaningEn: The One who creates distinct beings from nothing, with no prior model

evidence.textEn: The Creator, the Originator, the Fashioner

names.meaningAr: الذي صوّر جميع الموجودات وأعطى كل شيء صورته
names.meaningEn: The One who forms and shapes all things in the best form

evidence.textAr: هُوَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْخَالِقُ ٱلْبَارِئُ ٱلْمُصَوِّرُ لَهُ ٱلْأَسْمَاءُ ٱلْحُسْنَى
evidence.textEn: He is Allah, the Creator, the Originator, the Fashioner. To Him belong the best names

names.meaningAr: الذي يغفر الذنوب مهما عظمت ويستر العيوب
names.meaningEn: The One who forgives sins again and again, no matter how great
names.benefitAr: من ذكره غفر الله ذنوبه
names.benefitEn: Whoever remembers this name, Allah will forgive their sins

evidence.textAr: وَإِنِّي لَغَفَّارٌ لِمَنْ تَابَ وَآمَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَالِحًا ثُمَّ ٱهْتَدَى
evidence.textEn: But indeed, I am the Perpetual Forgiver of whoever repents and believes and does righteousness and then continues in guidance

names.meaningAr: الذي قهر جميع الخلائق وأذعنت له الموجودات
names.meaningEn: The One who has subdued all of creation and to whom everything submits

evidence.textAr: قُلِ ٱللَّهُ خَالِقُ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ وَهُوَ ٱلْوَاحِدُ ٱلْقَهَّارُ
evidence.textEn: Say: Allah is the Creator of all things, and He is the One, the All-Subduer

names.meaningAr: الذي يهب لعباده ما يشاء بلا عوض ولا سبب
names.meaningEn: The One who gives freely and generously without expecting anything in return
names.benefitAr: من ذكره وسّع الله عليه رزقه
names.benefitEn: Whoever remembers this name, Allah will expand their provision

evidence.textAr: أَمْ عِنْدَهُمْ خَزَائِنُ رَحْمَةِ رَبِّكَ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْوَهَّابِ
evidence.textEn: Or do they have the depositories of the mercy of your Lord, the Almighty, the Bestower?

names.meaningAr: الذي يرزق جميع الخلائق ولا ينسى أحدًا من رزقه
names.meaningEn: The One who provides sustenance for all of creation
names.benefitAr: من ذكره رزقه الله من حيث لا يحتسب
names.benefitEn: Whoever remembers this name, Allah will provide for them from unexpected sources

evidence.textAr: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلرَّزَّاقُ ذُو ٱلْقُوَّةِ ٱلْمَتِينُ
evidence.textEn: Indeed, it is Allah who is the Provider, the firm possessor of strength

names.meaningAr: الذي يفتح أبواب الرحمة والرزق والنصر لعباده
names.meaningEn: The One who opens the gates of mercy, provision, and victory for His servants
names.benefitAr: من ذكره بعد صلاة الفجر فتح الله عليه أبواب الخير
names.benefitEn: Whoever remembers this name after Fajr prayer, Allah will open doors of goodness

evidence.textEn: And He is the Opener, the All-Knowing

names.meaningAr: الذي يعلم كل شيء ولا يخفى عليه شيء في الأرض ولا في السماء
names.meaningEn: The One whose knowledge encompasses all things, nothing is hidden from Him

evidence.textEn: And He is, of all things, All-Knowing

names.meaningAr: الذي يقبض الأرزاق والأرواح بحكمته
names.meaningEn: The One who constricts and withholds according to His wisdom

evidence.textEn: And Allah withholds and extends, and to Him you will be returned

names.meaningAr: الذي يبسط الرزق لمن يشاء بحكمته وكرمه
names.meaningEn: The One who extends and expands provision for whom He wills

evidence.textEn: And Allah withholds and extends, and to Him you will be returned

names.meaningAr: الذي يخفض من يشاء من المتكبرين والجبارين
names.meaningEn: The One who lowers and humbles whomever He wills

evidence.textAr: إن الله يرفع بهذا الكتاب أقوامًا ويضع به آخرين
evidence.textEn: Allah raises some people by this Book and lowers others by it

names.meaningAr: الذي يرفع المؤمنين بالطاعة والإيمان
names.meaningEn: The One who raises and elevates the status of the believers

evidence.textAr: يَرْفَعِ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ آمَنُوا مِنْكُمْ وَٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا ٱلْعِلْمَ دَرَجَاتٍ
evidence.textEn: Allah will raise those who have believed among you and those who were given knowledge, by degrees

names.meaningAr: الذي يعز من يشاء من عباده بطاعته
names.meaningEn: The One who bestows honor and power upon whomever He wills

evidence.textAr: تُعِزُّ مَنْ تَشَاءُ وَتُذِلُّ مَنْ تَشَاءُ
evidence.textEn: You honor whom You will and You humble whom You will

names.meaningAr: الذي يذل من يشاء من عباده بمعصيته
names.meaningEn: The One who humbles and disgraces whomever He wills

evidence.textAr: تُعِزُّ مَنْ تَشَاءُ وَتُذِلُّ مَنْ تَشَاءُ بِيَدِكَ ٱلْخَيْرُ
evidence.textEn: You honor whom You will and You humble whom You will. In Your hand is all good

names.meaningAr: الذي يسمع جميع الأصوات لا يخفى عليه شيء
names.meaningEn: The One who hears all sounds and voices, nothing escapes His hearing

evidence.textEn: Indeed, He is the All-Hearing, the All-Knowing

names.meaningAr: الذي يرى كل شيء ولا يخفى عليه شيء
names.meaningEn: The One who sees all things, nothing is hidden from His sight

evidence.textEn: Indeed, Allah is ever Hearing and Seeing

names.meaningAr: الذي يحكم بين عباده بالعدل ولا يظلم أحدًا
names.meaningEn: The One who judges between His servants with justice

evidence.textEn: Then is it other than Allah I should seek as judge?

names.meaningAr: الذي لا يظلم أحدًا ويعدل في حكمه بين عباده
names.meaningEn: The One who is absolutely just in His judgment and never wrongs anyone

evidence.textEn: Indeed, Allah orders justice and good conduct

names.meaningAr: الذي يلطف بعباده ويوصل إليهم ما ينفعهم بلطف ورحمة
names.meaningEn: The One who is kind and gentle with His servants, bringing them benefit in subtle ways
names.benefitAr: من ذكره لطف الله به في أموره
names.benefitEn: Whoever remembers this name, Allah will be gentle with them in their affairs

evidence.textEn: Allah is Subtle with His servants

names.meaningAr: الذي يعلم بواطن الأمور وخفاياها
names.meaningEn: The One who is aware of the inner nature and hidden aspects of all things

evidence.textEn: And He is the Wise, the All-Aware

names.meaningAr: الذي لا يعجل بالعقوبة ويمهل عباده ليتوبوا
names.meaningEn: The One who is patient and does not hasten punishment, giving time for repentance

evidence.textEn: And Allah is Self-Sufficient and Forbearing

names.meaningAr: الذي له العظمة المطلقة في ذاته وصفاته وأفعاله
names.meaningEn: The One who possesses absolute greatness in His essence, attributes, and actions

evidence.textEn: And He is the Most High, the Magnificent

names.meaningAr: الذي يغفر ذنوب عباده مهما كثرت
names.meaningEn: The One who forgives abundantly regardless of how many sins are committed
names.benefitAr: من ذكره تاب الله عليه وغفر ذنبه
names.benefitEn: Whoever remembers this name, Allah will accept their repentance

evidence.textAr: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَذُو مَغْفِرَةٍ لِلنَّاسِ عَلَى ظُلْمِهِمْ
evidence.textEn: And indeed, your Lord is full of forgiveness for the people despite their wrongdoing

names.meaningAr: الذي يشكر القليل من العمل ويثيب عليه الكثير
names.meaningEn: The One who appreciates even the smallest deed and rewards it abundantly

evidence.textEn: Indeed, our Lord is Forgiving and Appreciative

names.meaningAr: الذي علا فوق كل شيء بذاته وصفاته
names.meaningEn: The One who is exalted above all creation in His essence and attributes

evidence.textEn: And He is the Most High, the Magnificent

names.meaningAr: الذي له الكبرياء والعظمة فوق كل شيء
names.meaningEn: The One who is greater than everything in status and majesty

evidence.textEn: Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, the Most Great, the Exalted

names.meaningAr: الذي يحفظ السماوات والأرض ومن فيهما
names.meaningEn: The One who preserves and protects the heavens and earth and all within them
names.benefitAr: من ذكره حفظه الله من كل سوء
names.benefitEn: Whoever remembers this name, Allah will protect them from all evil

evidence.textAr: إِنَّ رَبِّي عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ حَفِيظٌ
evidence.textEn: Indeed, my Lord is, over all things, Guardian

names.meaningAr: الذي يقيت الخلائق ويوصل إليهم أقواتهم
names.meaningEn: The One who nourishes and sustains all of creation

evidence.textAr: وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ مُقِيتًا
evidence.textEn: And ever is Allah, over all things, a Sustainer

names.meaningAr: الذي يحاسب عباده على أعمالهم
names.meaningEn: The One who takes account of all deeds and settles all accounts

evidence.textEn: And sufficient is Allah as Reckoner

names.meaningAr: ذو الجلال والعظمة والكبرياء
names.meaningEn: The One who possesses majesty, grandeur, and magnificence

evidence.textAr: تَبَارَكَ ٱسْمُ رَبِّكَ ذِي ٱلْجَلَالِ وَٱلْإِكْرَامِ
evidence.textEn: Blessed is the name of your Lord, Owner of Majesty and Honor

names.meaningAr: الكثير الخير الجواد المعطي الذي لا ينفد عطاؤه
names.meaningEn: The One who is generous, whose giving knows no end
names.benefitAr: من ذكره أكرمه الله في الدنيا والآخرة
names.benefitEn: Whoever remembers this name, Allah will honor them in this life and the Hereafter

evidence.textEn: Read, and your Lord is the Most Generous

names.meaningAr: الذي يراقب كل شيء ولا يغفل عن شيء
names.meaningEn: The One who watches over all things and is never neglectful

evidence.textEn: Indeed, Allah is ever, over you, an Observer

names.meaningAr: الذي يجيب دعاء الداعي إذا دعاه
names.meaningEn: The One who responds to the supplication of the one who calls upon Him
names.benefitAr: من ذكره استجاب الله دعاءه
names.benefitEn: Whoever remembers this name, Allah will answer their supplications

evidence.textEn: Indeed, my Lord is near and responsive

names.meaningAr: الذي وسعت رحمته وعلمه كل شيء
names.meaningEn: The One whose mercy and knowledge encompass all things

evidence.textEn: And Allah is All-Encompassing and All-Knowing

names.meaningAr: الذي يضع كل شيء في موضعه بحكمته البالغة
names.meaningEn: The One who is perfectly wise, placing everything in its proper place

evidence.textEn: And He is the Almighty, the All-Wise

names.meaningAr: الذي يحب عباده الصالحين ويحبونه
names.meaningEn: The One who loves His righteous servants and is loved by them
names.benefitAr: من ذكره وضع الله له المحبة في قلوب الناس
names.benefitEn: Whoever remembers this name, Allah will place love for them in people's hearts

evidence.textEn: And He is the Forgiving, the Most Loving

names.meaningAr: ذو المجد والشرف والعظمة
names.meaningEn: The One who possesses glory, honor, and supreme greatness

evidence.textEn: Owner of the Glorious Throne

names.meaningAr: الذي يبعث الخلائق من قبورهم يوم القيامة
names.meaningEn: The One who resurrects all creation from their graves on the Day of Judgment

evidence.textAr: وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَبْعَثُ مَنْ فِي ٱلْقُبُورِ
evidence.textEn: And that Allah will resurrect those in the graves

names.meaningAr: الذي يشهد على كل شيء ولا يغيب عنه شيء
names.meaningEn: The One who witnesses all things and from whom nothing is absent

evidence.textEn: And Allah is, over all things, Witness

names.meaningAr: الموجود حقًا الذي لا شك في وجوده
names.meaningEn: The One who truly exists and whose existence is undeniable

evidence.textEn: That is because Allah is the Truth

names.meaningAr: الذي يتولى أمور عباده ويكفيهم ما أهمهم
names.meaningEn: The One who takes charge of His servants' affairs and suffices them
names.benefitAr: من ذكره كفاه الله ما أهمه
names.benefitEn: Whoever remembers this name, Allah will suffice them in their concerns

evidence.textEn: And sufficient is Allah as Trustee

names.meaningAr: ذو القوة المطلقة التي لا تُغلب
names.meaningEn: The One who possesses absolute strength that cannot be overcome

evidence.textEn: Indeed, Allah is Strong and Almighty

names.meaningAr: الشديد القوي الذي لا يلحقه ضعف
names.meaningEn: The One who is firm and strong, never affected by weakness

evidence.textAr: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلرَّزَّاقُ ذُو ٱلْقُوَّةِ ٱلْمَتِينُ
evidence.textEn: Indeed, it is Allah who is the Provider, the Firm possessor of strength

names.meaningAr: الذي يتولى أمور المؤمنين وينصرهم
names.meaningEn: The One who is the protective friend of the believers and supports them

evidence.textEn: And He is the Protecting Friend, the Praiseworthy

names.meaningAr: المستحق للحمد والثناء في كل حال
names.meaningEn: The One who is worthy of all praise in every condition

evidence.textEn: Indeed, Allah is the Self-Sufficient, the Praiseworthy

names.meaningAr: الذي أحصى كل شيء عددًا وعلمًا
names.meaningEn: The One who has counted and enumerated everything in His knowledge

evidence.textEn: And has enumerated everything in number

names.meaningAr: الذي بدأ الخلق أول مرة من غير مثال سابق
names.meaningEn: The One who originated creation for the first time without any prior model

evidence.textEn: Indeed, it is He who originates and repeats

names.meaningAr: الذي يعيد الخلائق بعد فنائهم
names.meaningEn: The One who restores creation after its annihilation

evidence.textEn: Indeed, it is He who originates and repeats

names.meaningAr: الذي يحيي الموتى ويعطي الحياة لكل حي
names.meaningEn: The One who gives life to the dead and grants life to all living things

evidence.textAr: إِنَّهُ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ ۞ وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي يُحْيِي وَيُمِيتُ
evidence.textEn: Indeed, He is over all things competent. And it is He who gives life and causes death

names.meaningAr: الذي خلق الموت وقدره على كل حي
names.meaningEn: The One who created death and decrees it upon every living being

evidence.textEn: It is He who gives life and causes death

names.meaningAr: الحي الذي لا يموت، الباقي الدائم
names.meaningEn: The One who is eternally living and never dies
names.benefitAr: من ذكره أحيا الله قلبه
names.benefitEn: Whoever remembers this name, Allah will enliven their heart

evidence.textAr: ٱللَّهُ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ٱلْحَيُّ ٱلْقَيُّومُ
evidence.textEn: Allah - there is no deity except Him, the Ever-Living, the Self-Sustaining

names.meaningAr: القائم بذاته المقيم لغيره، الذي لا يحتاج إلى أحد
names.meaningEn: The One who is self-sustaining and sustains all of creation
names.benefitAr: من ذكره قوّاه الله على طاعته
names.benefitEn: Whoever remembers this name, Allah will strengthen them in obedience

evidence.textAr: ٱللَّهُ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ٱلْحَيُّ ٱلْقَيُّومُ
evidence.textEn: Allah - there is no deity except Him, the Ever-Living, the Self-Sustaining

names.meaningAr: الغني الذي لا يفتقر إلى شيء
names.meaningEn: The One who finds whatever He wills and is never in need

evidence.textAr: إن لله تسعة وتسعين اسمًا مائة إلا واحدًا من أحصاها دخل الجنة
evidence.textEn: Allah has ninety-nine names, one hundred minus one. Whoever enumerates them will enter Paradise

names.meaningAr: الماجد الكريم الذي بلغ في الكرم والجود منتهاه
names.meaningEn: The One whose generosity and nobility have reached the utmost

evidence.textEn: Qaf. By the glorious Quran

names.meaningAr: المنفرد بذاته وصفاته وأفعاله لا شريك له
names.meaningEn: The One who is unique in His essence, attributes, and actions, with no partner

evidence.textAr: وَإِلَهُكُمْ إِلَهٌ وَاحِدٌ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ٱلرَّحْمَنُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
evidence.textEn: And your god is one God. There is no deity except Him, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful

names.meaningAr: الفرد الذي لم يلد ولم يولد ولم يكن له كفوًا أحد
names.meaningEn: The Uniquely One, who does not beget nor was begotten, and to whom none is comparable

evidence.textEn: Say: He is Allah, the One

names.meaningAr: السيد الذي يُصمد إليه في الحوائج، الغني عن كل أحد
names.meaningEn: The Eternal Lord who is relied upon in all needs and is self-sufficient

evidence.textEn: Allah, the Eternal Refuge

names.meaningAr: الذي يقدر على كل شيء ولا يعجزه شيء
names.meaningEn: The One who is capable of all things and nothing renders Him incapable

evidence.textAr: قُلْ هُوَ ٱلْقَادِرُ عَلَى أَنْ يَبْعَثَ عَلَيْكُمْ عَذَابًا
evidence.textEn: Say: He is the One Able to send upon you affliction

names.meaningAr: التام القدرة الذي لا يمتنع عليه شيء
names.meaningEn: The One whose power is absolute and from whom nothing can escape

evidence.textAr: فِي مَقْعَدِ صِدْقٍ عِنْدَ مَلِيكٍ مُقْتَدِرٍ
evidence.textEn: In a seat of honor near a Sovereign, All-Powerful

names.meaningAr: الذي يقدم من يشاء بفضله
names.meaningEn: The One who brings forward whomever He wills by His grace

evidence.textAr: اللهم اغفر لي ما قدمت وما أخرت
evidence.textEn: O Allah, forgive me what I have done before and what I will do after

names.meaningAr: الذي يؤخر من يشاء بعدله
names.meaningEn: The One who delays and puts back whomever He wills by His justice

evidence.textAr: أنت المقدم وأنت المؤخر لا إله إلا أنت
evidence.textEn: You are the Expediter and You are the Delayer. There is no deity except You

names.meaningAr: الذي ليس قبله شيء، الأزلي بلا بداية
names.meaningEn: The One who has no beginning, existing before all else

evidence.textEn: He is the First and the Last, the Ascendant and the Intimate

names.meaningAr: الذي ليس بعده شيء، الأبدي بلا نهاية
names.meaningEn: The One who has no end, remaining after all else ceases to exist

evidence.textEn: He is the First and the Last

names.meaningAr: الذي ظهر فوق كل شيء فليس فوقه شيء
names.meaningEn: The One who is above all things; nothing is above Him

evidence.textAr: وَٱلظَّاهِرُ وَٱلْبَاطِنُ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمٌ
evidence.textEn: The Ascendant and the Intimate, and He is, of all things, Knowing

names.meaningAr: الذي لا تدركه الأبصار ولا تحيط به الأفهام
names.meaningEn: The One who is hidden from perception; minds cannot fully comprehend Him

evidence.textAr: وَٱلظَّاهِرُ وَٱلْبَاطِنُ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمٌ
evidence.textEn: The Ascendant and the Intimate, and He is, of all things, Knowing

names.meaningAr: المالك لكل شيء المدبر لأمور خلقه
names.meaningEn: The One who governs and manages all affairs of creation

evidence.textAr: وَمَا لَهُمْ مِنْ دُونِهِ مِنْ وَالٍ
evidence.textEn: And there is for them besides Him no governor

names.meaningAr: المتعالي عن صفات الخلق وعن كل نقص
names.meaningEn: The One who is exalted far above all imperfections and the attributes of creation

evidence.textEn: Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, the Most Great, the Most Exalted

names.meaningAr: الذي يبر عباده ويحسن إليهم
names.meaningEn: The One who is kind and beneficent to His servants

evidence.textEn: Indeed, it is He who is the Good, the Merciful

names.meaningAr: الذي يقبل توبة عباده ويعفو عنهم
names.meaningEn: The One who accepts repentance from His servants and pardons them
names.benefitAr: من ذكره فتح الله عليه باب التوبة
names.benefitEn: Whoever remembers this name, Allah will open for them the door of repentance

evidence.textEn: Indeed, it is He who is the Acceptor of Repentance, the Merciful

names.meaningAr: الذي ينتقم ممن عصاه ولم يتب
names.meaningEn: The One who takes retribution from those who disobey and do not repent

evidence.textEn: Indeed, from the criminals We will take retribution

names.meaningAr: الذي يمحو الذنوب ويتجاوز عن المعاصي
names.meaningEn: The One who pardons sins and wipes them away completely
names.benefitAr: من ذكره عفا الله عنه وتجاوز عن سيئاته
names.benefitEn: Whoever remembers this name, Allah will pardon and overlook their sins

evidence.textEn: Indeed, Allah is ever Pardoning and Forgiving

names.meaningAr: ذو الرأفة والرحمة الخاصة بعباده
names.meaningEn: The One who possesses great kindness and compassion for His servants

evidence.textEn: Indeed, Allah is, to the people, Kind and Merciful

names.meaningAr: المالك لجميع الأملاك المتصرف فيها كيف يشاء
names.meaningEn: The One who owns all sovereignty and dominion, disposing of it as He wills

evidence.textAr: قُلِ ٱللَّهُمَّ مَالِكَ ٱلْمُلْكِ تُؤْتِي ٱلْمُلْكَ مَنْ تَشَاءُ
evidence.textEn: Say: O Allah, Owner of Sovereignty, You give sovereignty to whom You will

names.meaningAr: صاحب العظمة والكبرياء والفضل والإحسان
names.meaningEn: The One who possesses majesty, glory, and supreme generosity

evidence.textAr: تَبَارَكَ ٱسْمُ رَبِّكَ ذِي ٱلْجَلَالِ وَٱلْإِكْرَامِ
evidence.textEn: Blessed is the name of your Lord, Owner of Majesty and Honor

names.meaningAr: الذي يعدل في حكمه وقضائه
names.meaningEn: The One who acts with equity and justice in His judgment

evidence.textAr: شَهِدَ ٱللَّهُ أَنَّهُ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا هُوَ وَٱلْمَلَائِكَةُ وَأُولُو ٱلْعِلْمِ قَائِمًا بِٱلْقِسْطِ
evidence.textEn: Allah witnesses that there is no deity except Him, and so do the angels and those of knowledge, maintaining justice

names.meaningAr: الذي يجمع الخلائق ليوم لا ريب فيه
names.meaningEn: The One who gathers all creation on a Day about which there is no doubt

evidence.textAr: رَبَّنَا إِنَّكَ جَامِعُ ٱلنَّاسِ لِيَوْمٍ لَا رَيْبَ فِيهِ
evidence.textEn: Our Lord, surely You will gather the people for a Day about which there is no doubt

names.meaningAr: المستغني عن كل شيء والكل محتاج إليه
names.meaningEn: The One who is free of all needs, while all creation is in need of Him

evidence.textAr: يَا أَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ أَنْتُمُ ٱلْفُقَرَاءُ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَٱللَّهُ هُوَ ٱلْغَنِيُّ ٱلْحَمِيدُ
evidence.textEn: O mankind, you are those in need of Allah, while Allah is the Self-Sufficient, the Praiseworthy

names.meaningAr: الذي يغني من يشاء من عباده
names.meaningEn: The One who enriches whomever He wills from His servants
names.benefitAr: من ذكره أغناه الله من فضله
names.benefitEn: Whoever remembers this name, Allah will enrich them from His bounty

evidence.textEn: And that it is He who enriches and suffices

names.meaningAr: الذي يمنع من يشاء بحكمته ويعطي من يشاء برحمته
names.meaningEn: The One who withholds and prevents according to His wisdom

evidence.textAr: لا مانع لما أعطيت ولا معطي لما منعت
evidence.textEn: None can prevent what You have given, and none can give what You have prevented

names.meaningAr: الذي يقدر الضر على من يشاء بحكمته
names.meaningEn: The One who decrees harm upon whomever He wills by His wisdom

evidence.textAr: وَإِنْ يَمْسَسْكَ ٱللَّهُ بِضُرٍّ فَلَا كَاشِفَ لَهُ إِلَّا هُوَ
evidence.textEn: And if Allah should touch you with adversity, there is no remover of it except Him

names.meaningAr: الذي يقدر النفع لمن يشاء من عباده
names.meaningEn: The One who brings benefit to whomever He wills from His servants

evidence.textAr: قُلْ أَفَرَأَيْتُمْ مَا تَدْعُونَ مِنْ دُونِ ٱللَّهِ إِنْ أَرَادَنِيَ ٱللَّهُ بِضُرٍّ هَلْ هُنَّ كَاشِفَاتُ ضُرِّهِ أَوْ أَرَادَنِي بِرَحْمَةٍ هَلْ هُنَّ مُمْسِكَاتُ رَحْمَتِهِ
evidence.textEn: Say: Have you considered that which you invoke besides Allah? If Allah intended me harm, are they removers of His harm; or if He intended me mercy, are they withholders of His mercy?

names.meaningAr: نور السماوات والأرض الذي أنار بنوره كل شيء
names.meaningEn: The Light of the heavens and the earth who illuminates everything with His light
names.benefitAr: من ذكره أنار الله بصيرته
names.benefitEn: Whoever remembers this name, Allah will illuminate their insight

evidence.textEn: Allah is the Light of the heavens and the earth

names.meaningAr: الذي يهدي عباده إلى الصراط المستقيم
names.meaningEn: The One who guides His servants to the straight path
names.benefitAr: من ذكره هداه الله إلى الحق
names.benefitEn: Whoever remembers this name, Allah will guide them to the truth

evidence.textAr: وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَهَادِ ٱلَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِلَى صِرَاطٍ مُسْتَقِيمٍ
evidence.textEn: And indeed, Allah is the Guide of those who have believed to a straight path

names.meaningAr: الذي أبدع الخلق بلا مثال سابق
names.meaningEn: The One who originated creation in a unique way without any prior example

evidence.textEn: Originator of the heavens and the earth

names.meaningAr: الذي يبقى ولا يفنى
names.meaningEn: The One who remains and never perishes

evidence.textAr: وَيَبْقَى وَجْهُ رَبِّكَ ذُو ٱلْجَلَالِ وَٱلْإِكْرَامِ
evidence.textEn: And there will remain the Face of your Lord, Owner of Majesty and Honor

names.meaningAr: الذي يرث الأرض ومن عليها وإليه يرجع كل شيء
names.meaningEn: The One who inherits the earth and everything upon it after all else perishes

evidence.textAr: وَإِنَّا لَنَحْنُ نُحْيِي وَنُمِيتُ وَنَحْنُ ٱلْوَارِثُونَ
evidence.textEn: And indeed, it is We who give life and cause death, and We are the Inheritor

names.nameEn: The Guide to the Right Path
names.meaningAr: الذي يرشد الخلق إلى مصالحهم بحكمته
names.meaningEn: The One who directs all affairs with wisdom and guides creation to their best interests

evidence.textAr: إن لله تسعة وتسعين اسمًا مائة إلا واحدًا من أحصاها دخل الجنة
evidence.textEn: Allah has ninety-nine names, one hundred minus one. Whoever enumerates them will enter Paradise

names.meaningAr: الذي لا يعجل بالعقوبة على عباده بل يمهلهم ويتأنى بهم
names.meaningEn: The One who does not hasten punishment upon His servants, but gives them time and is patient with them
names.benefitAr: من ذكره أعانه الله على الصبر
names.benefitEn: Whoever remembers this name, Allah will help them with patience

evidence.textAr: لا أحد أصبر على أذى سمعه من الله
evidence.textEn: No one is more patient in the face of harm than Allah
